sentences.en: But theological differences certainly exist, and have to be managed.
sentences.cn: 但理念上的差异的确存在, 并需要得到管控.

sentences.en: Did he not offer any reasons for what he did or did he have theological and philosophical discussions with Pilate about his message?
sentences.cn: 他没有为他的行为给出任何解释,还是他说了一些神学和哲学的观点,和彼拉多进行了一番讨论呢？

sentences.en: He has been doing clerical work since his graduation from theological college.
sentences.cn: 他从神学院毕业后就一直担任神职工作.

sentences.en: He teaches the Bible in theological schools and is a pious Christian.
sentences.cn: 他在经学院教授圣经,是个虔诚的基督徒.

sentences.en: He was the ultimate arbiter on both theological and political matters.
sentences.cn: 他在神学和政治事务上都是最终的仲裁人。

sentences.en: I think now we can see why these lines about the autumnal leavesare so difficult for us to incorporate into a moral reading or a theological reading of the poem.
sentences.cn: 我们现在可以看到为什么,这些关于秋天的落叶的句子如此难以,与对这首诗的道德或者神学的理解相结合。

sentences.en: Neither it nor his other theological versetreatises rise far above doggerel.
sentences.cn: 跟他的其他有关神学的议论诗一样,这不比拙劣的打油诗高明多少.

sentences.en: Objective To study the Theological behavior of PAA - Pluronic ~? F 127 graft copolymers.
sentences.cn: 目的:研究丙烯酸-Pluronic~? F127接枝共聚物的流变学性质.

sentences.en: One reviewer of my book referred to this type of answer as "punting"—by which he inferred that it was an easy way out of theological dilemma.
sentences.cn: 一个评论家对我的书做出评论,称这种类型的回答是“赛艇”—他推测,这是一个简单的办法神学的两难境地。

sentences.en: Priests are trained at theological colleges.
Protestantism saw many theological developments, particularly after the 18 th cent.
sentences.cn: 尤其是18世纪后,新教经历了很多神学方面的发展.
最近的那个神学假设是可疑的.

sentences.en: She also has taught at Fuller Theological Seminary and United Theological Seminary.
sentences.cn: 她也在福乐神学和联合神学院教书.

sentences.en: The sixties were a time of theological ferment.
sentences.cn: 六十年代是神学上骚动的时代.

sentences.en: The theological collection was kept in a sacred place.
sentences.cn: 神学藏书收藏于宗教机构中.

sentences.en: Therefore, dormitory management has its place in the theological education in colleges.
sentences.cn: 可见, 宿舍管理在高校德育工作中具有重要的地位.

sentences.en: This book is not a theological book.
sentences.cn: 这部书不是一部神学的书.

sentences.en: Traditional theological usage: a style of worship and its associated rituals.
sentences.cn: 传统神学用法: 一种膜拜,与仪式有关联.

trans.tran_cn: 神学的，神学上的，研究神学的
